description.main: Our training center was created out of love and passion toward animals. It's the right place for your pets if you'd like to:
description.puppyTraining: together with a certified animal behaviorist, socialize your puppy to avoid future undesirable behavior
description.training: together with a licensed trainer, individually or in group, train your dog
description.walks: join us on our weekly pet walks, during which you will be able to discuss your dog's behavior with a behaviorist and exchange your experiences with other dog owners

about.ewa: Training and behavioral therapy are conducted by Ewa Jabłońska – the center's founder, COAPE-licensed bahaviorist, professional dog traininer, cynology expert witness and the creator's of radio broadcast Francuski Piesek on local Bon Ton radio based in Chełm.

puppySchool.p1: Puppy school covers eight meetings, each group consists of up to five puppies. Classes are taught by Ewa Jabłońska, certified behaviorist and dog trainer. We employ only positive reinforcement dog training methods!
puppySchool.p2: We employ only positive reinforcement dog training methods!

behavioral.description: __Konsultacja behawioralna trwa około dwóch godzin i jest przeprowadzana najczęściej w domu właściciela zwierzęcia, które prezentuje zaburzenia w zachowaniu.
behavioral.name: Animal behavioral therapy
behavioral.pricing: __100 zł + 80 zł pełny cykl dwóch spotkań

individual.description: One-to-one training is carried out at the dog owner's home or at our center. Exact training plan and covered subjects are tailored to the specific needs of the client.
individual.descriptionLong:
We don't try to bend the dog to our methodology, instead, together with the dog's owner, we look for the best solutions in a given case. Every pupil receives a programme tailored to his needs.

Theoretical classes:
  • basic knowledge about dog behavioral patterns
  • dog development periods
  • dogs' needs
  • introduction to animal communication, calming signals
  • dog dominance theory
  • feeding and care
  • rules of dog training
Basic obedience - practical training:
  • eye contact, targeting
  • loose-leash walking
  • walking next to the owner - "heel" command
  • coming when called - "come"
  • "drop it", "leave it", "take it"
  • any other commands, e.g. "sit", "stand", "settle down", "down", "stay"
individual.name: Individual training

services.info: __Na wszystkie produkty i usługi wystawiamy faktury VAT.

puppy.description: __Psie przedszkole obejmuje cykl 8 spotkań. W grupie znajduje się do 5 szczeniąt.
puppy.descriptionDisclaimer: __O dacie rozpoczęcia szkolenia informujemy po zebraniu się grupy zwierząt, możliwe jest też przedszkole indywidualne.
puppy.name: __Psie przedszkole

walks.description: __Podczas spacerów budujemy więź z psem, wymieniamy doświadczenia oraz miło spędzamy czas, rozmawiając o naszych czworonogach. Dzięki kontrolowanym spotkaniom, stwarzamy psu możliwości rozładowania nagromadzonej energii oraz nabycia nowych kompetencji społecznych. Spacery odbywają się w Chełmie i Włodawie.
walks.name: __Spacery edukacyjno-integracyjne
